meanings.definition: Of or relating to layers or strata.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a stratal design with different colored layers.
meanings.sent2: The stratal arrangement of the shelves made it easy to organize the books.
meanings.sent3: The stratal pattern on the wallpaper made the room look like a forest.

meanings.sent5: The stratal structure of the building resembled a giant layer cake.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or arranged in layers.
meanings.sent1: The lasagna had a delicious stratal combination of pasta, cheese, and sauce.
meanings.sent2: The stratal formation of the clouds made the sky look picturesque.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a stratal painting by layering different colors on the canvas.

meanings.definition: A layer or series of layers of rock in the ground.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the stratal composition of the rock formations.
meanings.sent2: The excavation revealed a rich stratal of ancient fossils.
meanings.sent3: The miners discovered a valuable stratal of minerals deep underground.
